      • update

        public boolean update​(Circuit circuit,
                      int power,
                      Side side)

        Triggers a tile update

        Checks if counter needs to be updated, by comparing the previous state with the next state of the counter
        Overrides:
        update in class Tile
        Parameters:
        circuit - Circuit where updates are taking place
        power - Power received on the update
        side - Side from which counter received an update
        Returns:
        true if timer was updated, false otherwise
